formatted_address: 71 Toh Guan Rd E, #05-07 Techcpr, Singapore 608598
name: Digital Hearing Aid Centre

reviews.text:
One of the most professional hearing aid center I have been to.
Mrs. Lee spent two afternoons with my husband and I. We really appreciate her patience, dedication and professionalism in getting us the right hearing aids. The world sounds much better now.
Thank you so much and we will definitely be back in the future when needed.

Bought a pair of colorful and powerful mobile control Signia CIC hearing aid 2 years ago and just got them back from after sales services. The hearing aid is refreshing with a new life again.
Thank you Ms. Li and Prof Chang recommendation of this Signia and appreciate their professional advice and patience in fine tuning my hearingaid to get my satisfaction.
I would highly recommend Digital Hearing Aid Centre on their services and their professional experience in hearing aid business.

My mum has very bad hearing and Prof and Ms Lee were very helpful and spent a lot of time with my mum to get her a hearih aid set which she could hear with reasonably well.  Their service is very good and I will highly recommend them.  Thank you so much for being so patient with my mum.

Highly NOT recommended to come here if you want to do ear impression for CIEM.

1). When ear impression something wrong or not perfect, they would not help you to redo or refund for you.

2). This place made me spend extra $300 for reshell service, new ear impression at other places and 3 months for shipping and processing.

Visiting from US, my 88 year old mother's hearing aid device stopped working. The store spend 2 hours to fix the problem and were very helpful. This really saved our trip to Singapore. Highly recommended.
